輢字的基本解释

輢
yǐ
古代车箱两旁人可以倚靠的木板。
凭倚，靠近：“枕輢交趾。”

輢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐ］
［《廣韻》於綺切，上紙，影。］
［《廣韻》於義切，去寘，影。］
［《廣韻》奇寄切，去寘，羣。］
(1)车箱两旁的木板。
(2)凭倚。

輢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第06
【廣韻】於綺切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】隱綺切，?音倚。【說文】車旁也。　又【集韻】奇寄切，音芰。車旁兵所插處。　又【正韻】於戲切，音意。義同。

輢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
輢字的起名意思

暂无。

Hang
Basic explanation of words
Hang
yǐ
Wooden boards that people can lean on on both sides of the ancient carriage.
Lean, close: "Occipital constriction and toe."
Hang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐ］
["Guangyun" Yu Qiqie, on paper, film. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Yiqie, go to set, and film. ]
["Guang Yun" Qi Ji cut, go to set, group. ]
(1) Wooden boards on both sides of the carriage.
(2) By relying on.

[Guang Yun] Yu Qiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Enlighten Qiqie, and the sound leans against it. [Said Wen] Also beside the car.　 [Ji Yun] Qi Ji Qi cut, sound 芰. The soldiers intervened next to the car.　 [Zheng Yun] cut in the opera, sound and meaning. The same meaning.
